title: [Geyser Flats, Fumarole]
description: The trail ends at a mound of silica-stained rock with a jagged fissure at its crown.  From the opening erupts a loud hissing vent of steam and gases, topping the fumarole like a plume on a fancy hat.  Pieces of petrified tree trunks litter the ground beyond the steam vent, victims of the geothermal violence.

The trail ends at a mound of silica-stained rock with a jagged fissure at its crown.  From the opening erupts a loud hissing vent of steam and gases, topping the fumarole like a plume on a fancy hat.  Pieces of petrified tree trunks litter the ground in the moonlight, victims of the geothermal violence.
